Header: Everyone must come together to protect stability of the country: President Rajapaksa
Content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa says that everyone must come together to protect the stability of the country in order to build the nation. He made this statement during an event held at Temple Trees to express gratitude to members of mediation boards who have been in service for a long period of time. President Rajapaksa also stated that instability could hinder development of the nation, adding that Western nations would never be able to subjugate Sri Lanka.
